title: Crash after champ select
body:
I went into a game, after we chose our champions the icon popped then I got an error: https://gyazo.com/0bb217580b85352ddab42b2016f31adb

I close the game and reopen and get this message: https://gyazo.com/6505829ffe9f24eb72e8b3c7eeb55f34

30 minutes later of waiting still: "calculating differences | 2 Files Scanned"

replies.body: It looks like you had a bugsplat due to a corrupted game file, so the system wanted to run repairs.  The patcher needs permission to scan your files, so it's possible that the files scanned may not budge if it's being blocked.  I suggest going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure everything is setup to allow access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thanks for the screenshot!  If you're still experiencing this issue, let me know at what percent on the top of the patcher you are receiving this error.  I'll be around!

Thanks!  At this point in the process, the patcher is downloading and updating game files, but an error here can indicate a network problem preventing that.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  That should get you fixed up!
